item.title: Multiple Paving Projects, July 16th - August 6th
item.description: Please be advised that the Site Services Department will be overseeing multiple paving projects within the coming weeks. We will be repaving sidewalks in the following areas: Around the Rensselaer Student Union, West Lot, Albright Lot, all sidewalks surrounding Albright, Cook Drive from the circle in front of the Houston Field House to the intersection of Sunset Avenue and sidewalks between the buildings in Stacwyck.

item.title: Potential Traffic Disruption - Roadway Between JRSC and JEC begins July 7
item.description: Potential Traffic Disruption - Roadway between JRSC and JEC Generator/Fuel Tank Removal and Generator Installation, July 7th - Months End. Please be advised that beginning July 7th, work will commence on the removal and replacement of an underground fuel tank and generator at the roadway between JRSC and JEC. This multiphase project may result in intermittent disruptions to vehicular and pedestrian traffic in the area throughout the month of July.

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Seminar- “RPI MAX: Setting Goals and Reviewing Results”-Part 1 | July 17
item.description: Thursday, July 17, 2025 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM - This seminar will establish the positive effect of transforming the traditional role of planner and evaluator solely from the people-leader to a shared responsibility between leader and direct report. Leaders will experience how to develop and use effective SMART goals to help track progress and accurately evaluate outcomes. In addition, the fundamentals of an impactful performance discussion and the three phased approach of RPI MAX will be explored.

item.description:
